==Elemental Skills==
In the table below, when a number of particles is not an integer, then the floor of the number is the guaranteed amount, while the decimal portion is the chance for an additional particle. For example, Jean's Elemental Skill, denoted as 2.67 particles, generates 2 particles with a 67% chance for a third.
